title: Feedback. RP Icon is not consistent throughout.
body:
RP(Riot points) have always been indicated with red coloring, It "pops". IP has always been a White/Grey color. White = IP Red = RP 

**In [this image](http://i.imgur.com/9XKNVG0.png) you can see how the new RP icon not having that red outline blends right in next to the IP Icon.**

**The RP icon in the shop has always been outlined with red and currently is in new client BUT only at the [top](http://i.imgur.com/AO2AKGG.png) where it shows how much RP you have left.** 

**It should be consistent with the prices listed on things in the shop.**

replies.body: We are aware of those inconsistencies and we'll correct them. Thanks for testing the alpha!
